name: LigoLab
tag_list: anatomic-pathology, laboratory, workflow, specimen-tracking, document-imaging, lis, ap, laboratory-information-system
overview: LigoLab is a dynamic, comprehensive and scalable laboratory information system designed to accommodate a wide array of laboratory environments with a special emphasis on the Anatomical Pathology workflow. LigoLab addresses the complete life-cycle of laboratory operations starting from remote ordering to in-office result reporting. Providing an intuitive, user friendly interface, LigoLab is composed of both highly integrated and modular solutions for remote (in-office) support, document imaging, specimen tracking, laboratory business support, including billing. LigoLab is the clear choice for discriminating, modern laboratories seeking efficiency, reliability, improved patient care, overhead reduction and maximal generation of revenue.
